commitMessage:
@@@[FLINK-8695] [rocksdb] Move flink-statebackend-rocksdb from 'flink-contrib' to 'flink-state-backends'.

This closes #5523

@@@[FLINK-8790][State] Improve performance of rescaling an incremental checkpoint

This closes #5582.

@@@[FLINK-9572] Extend InternalAppendingState with internal stored state access

This closes #6156.
@@@[FLINK-10124][state] Use ByteArrayDataInput/OutputView instead of stream + wrapper

@@@[FLINK-10176][state] Replace ByteArrayData[Input|Output]View with (enhanced) Data[Output|InputDe]Serializer

This closes #6583.

@@@[FLINK-9702] Improvement in (de)serialization of keys and values for RocksDB state

This closes #7288.

Co-authored-by: Stefan Richter <s.richter@data-artisans.com>
Co-authored-by: klion26 <qcx978132955@gmail.com>

@@@[FLINK-14997][state-backends] Avoid unnecessary delete() calls in RocksDBState's mergeNamespaces implementation

This helps to improve the performance after the changed from FLINK-7700.

This closes #10383
